sentences.en: a mug of steaming hot coffee
sentences.cn: 一大杯热气腾腾的咖啡

sentences.en: A pot was steaming on top of the cooker.
sentences.cn: 锅在炉子上冒着热气。

sentences.en: a rebellion that had run out of steam.
sentences.cn: 没了劲的反叛。

sentences.en: Be careful not to scald yourself with the steam.
sentences.cn: 小心别让蒸汽把你烫着。

sentences.en: He picked up his mug and blew off the steam.
sentences.cn: 他端起杯子，吹走了热气。

sentences.en: his campaign steadily picked up steam.
sentences.cn: 他的竞选活动稳步地获得越来越多的动力。

sentences.en: In 1941, the train would have been pulled by a steam engine.
sentences.cn: 1941年，火车本可以由蒸汽机车拉动。

sentences.en: In an electric power plant the heat converts water into high-pressure steam.
sentences.cn: 在发电厂里，热能将水转化成高压蒸汽。

sentences.en: Plans are rolling full steam ahead for the Jamaica Festival.
sentences.cn: 庆祝牙买加节的准备工作正开展得如火如荼。

sentences.en: Smoke was used to simulate steam coming from a smashed radiator.
sentences.cn: 用烟来模拟从撞碎的散热器中冒出的蒸气。

sentences.en: Steam billowed out from under the bonnet.
sentences.cn: 引擎盖下喷出滚滚的蒸汽。

sentences.en: Steam condenses into water when it cools.
sentences.cn: 蒸汽冷却时凝结为水。

sentences.en: Steam or microwave the vegetables until tender.
sentences.cn: 蒸或者用微波炉加热蔬菜，直至蔬菜变软。

sentences.en: Steam rose from the boiling kettle.
sentences.cn: 壶里的水开了，冒着蒸汽。

sentences.en: Steam rose from the hot tub.
sentences.cn: 水蒸气从热腾腾的浴缸里升起。

sentences.en: Steam the carrots until they are just beginning to be tender.
sentences.cn: 将胡萝卜蒸至刚好变软。

sentences.en: Steam the vegetables lightly.
sentences.cn: 把蔬菜稍蒸一下。

sentences.en: steamed broccoli
sentences.cn: 蒸西蓝花

sentences.en: steamed fish
sentences.cn: 蒸鱼

sentences.en: Suddenly, clouds of steam started to belch from the engine.
sentences.cn: 突然，滚滚蒸汽从发动机里冒了出来。

sentences.en: The steam escaped with a loud hissing noise.
sentences.cn: 蒸汽大声地嘶嘶冒了出来。

sentences.en: Wallcoverings and floors should be able to withstand steam and splashes.
sentences.cn: 墙面材料和地板都应该能耐热汽且防水。

sentences.en: we're going to have to get there under our own steam.
sentences.cn: 我们必须靠自己的力量到达那里。

sentences.en: Who invented the steam engine?
sentences.cn: 谁发明了蒸汽机？

words.tran_cn: 蒸汽的；雾重的，潮湿的；充满蒸汽的
蒸汽压路机；压倒对方的手段
用压路机把…压平；以势压倒

phrases.tran_cn: （计划的早期）逐渐获得驱动力

phrases.phrase: have steam coming out of one's ears

phrases.tran_cn: （蒸汽机车）准备工作，准备发动，一切就绪
(非正式)发泄被压抑的感情；泄怒
动力煤；蒸汽煤；短沼煤；锅炉煤
蒸汽发生器；蒸汽锅炉；蒸汽发电机
蒸汽喷射，蒸汽注入；射汽法
汽轮机；蒸汽轮机；蒸汽透平

trans.tran_en: the hot mist that water produces when it is boiled
if something steams, steam rises from it, especially because it is hot

trans.tran_cn: 发出蒸汽，冒热气；产生蒸汽；靠蒸汽动力行进
trans.tran_en: if something steams, steam rises from it, especially because it is hot

trans.tran_cn: 蒸； 煮； 用蒸汽开动
